subject: Junit does not release resources
msgSnippet: I have noticed that JUnit keeps a reference to an instance of every class for every fixture run, even after tests have completed.  Is it possible to get JUnit
messageBody:
I have noticed that JUnit keeps a reference to an instance of every
class for every fixture run, even after tests have completed. Is it
possible to get JUnit to release test resources after the test runs?

Thanks

Kathey
